projects.title: Champion Choice
projects.description: Champion Choice is basically a betting application that is primarily used for betting on major football leagues. It has gained quite a few users, and this app has also been launched in the USA

projects.title: Gnizzel
projects.description: Gnizzel is basically a dental app that connects patients and dentists, allowing customers to create or access deals. It's a MEAN stack application.

projects.title: Career Guidance
projects.description: Career Guidance is basically a platform for students and professionals where they can schedule their tasks on the calendar and can also create their resumes here.
